messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: The investigation was led by Detective Harriet Lundsford, who worked with Technician Mark Corrigan to process the crime scene. Multiple interviews were conducted by Sergeant Peter Malloy with witnesses at the scene. Officer Timothy Rakes responded to the initial call, arriving first and securing the perimeter. Criminalist Sarah James analyzed fibers found on the victim's clothing, which later turned out to be a crucial piece of evidence. Deputy Marcus Flint coordinated with local law enforcement agencies to gather additional information. Patrol Officer Linda Barrett filed the initial report and was later joined by Lieutenant Harold Gomez, who oversaw the operations. Captain Richard Wells provided strategic guidance throughout the case. Dr. Emily Stanton, the coroner, concluded the victim's cause of death to be a homicide. Possible suspects include John Doe and Jane Smith, whose alibis are currently being vetted by Detective Arnold Philips and Officer Naomi Watts. The investigation is ongoing as new evidence is reviewed by Technician Alex Mercer.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detective Harriet LundsfordOfficer Context: Led the investigation and worked with Technician Mark Corrigan to process the crime scene.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Technician Mark CorriganOfficer Context: Worked with Detective Harriet Lundsford to process the crime scene.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant Peter MalloyOfficer Context: Conducted multiple interviews with witnesses at the scene.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Officer Timothy RakesOfficer Context: Responded to the initial call and secured the perimeter.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Criminalist Sarah JamesOfficer Context: Analyzed fibers found on the victim's clothing which were crucial evidence.Officer Role: CriminalistOfficer Name: Deputy Marcus FlintOfficer Context: Coordinated with local law enforcement agencies for additional information.Officer Role: DeputyOfficer Name: Patrol Officer Linda BarrettOfficer Context: Filed the initial report and was later joined by Lieutenant Harold Gomez.Officer Role: Patrol OfficerOfficer Name: Lieutenant Harold GomezOfficer Context: Joined Patrol Officer Linda Barrett and oversaw operations.Officer Role: LieutenantOfficer Name: Captain Richard WellsOfficer Context: Provided strategic guidance throughout the case.Officer Role: CaptainOfficer Name: Dr. Emily StantonOfficer Context: Concluded the victim's cause of death to be a homicide.Officer Role: CoronerOfficer Name: Detective Arnold PhilipsOfficer Context: Currently vetting alibis of possible suspects John Doe and Jane Smith.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Officer Naomi WattsOfficer Context: Assisting Detective Arnold Philips in vetting alibis of possible suspects.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Technician Alex MercerOfficer Context: Reviewing new evidence in the ongoing investigation.Officer Role: Technician
